download_uri.description: Specify the URI to download the Docker ZIP archive.

experimental.description: Specify whether to enable experimental feature. Defaults to `true`.

max_concurrent_downloads.description: Specify the max concurrent downloads for each pull. Defaults to `8`.

max_concurrent_uploads.description: Specify the max concurrent uploads for each push. Defaults to `8`.

max_download_attempts.description: Specify the max download attempts for each pull. Defaults to `10`.

push_foreign_layers.description: Specify where to push none distributable artifacts, like 'mcr.microsoft.com' layer. Defaults to `false`.

registry_mirrors.description: Specify the list of registry mirror.

version.description: Specify the version of Docker. Defaults to `19.03`.

disable_release_build_args_injection.description: Specify whether to disable the release related build arguments injection, ref to https://registry.terraform.io/providers/thxCode/windbag/latest/docs#highlight.

disable_target_platform_args_injection.description: Specify whether to disable the target platform arguments injection, ref to https://registry.terraform.io/providers/thxCode/windbag/latest/docs#highlight.

file.description: Specify the path of the building Dockerfile.

force_rm.description: Specify to remove intermediate containers. Defaults to `false`.

isolation.description: Specify the isolation technology of container.

manifest.description: Specify to manifest the build artifact. Defaults to `true`.

manifest_timeout.description: Specify the timeout to manifest pre tag. Defaults to `15m`.

no_cache.description: Specify the isolation technology of container. Defaults to `false`.

push.description: Specify to push the build artifact. Defaults to `true`.

push_timeout.description: Specify the timeout to push pre build tag. Defaults to `15m`.

rm.description: Specify to remove intermediate containers after a successful build. Defaults to `true`.

tag.description: Specify the name of the built artifact, and use the repository of the last item as this resource ID.

target.description: Specify the target of build stage to build.

build_arg.description: Specify the build-time arguments of related release.

release.description: Specify the release ID of worker.

block.description: Specify the release related build-time arguments mapper.

address.description: Specify the address of the registry. Defaults to `docker.io`.

login_timeout.description: Specify the timeout to login. Defaults to `5m`.

password.description: Specify the password of the registry credential.

username.description: Specify the username of the registry credential.

block.description: Specify the authentication registry of registry.

build_context.description: Observed the build context of worker.

build_information.description: Observed the build information of worker.

work_dir.description: Specify the working directory of worker. Defaults to `C:/etc/windbag`.

cert.description: Specify the content of Certificate to authenticate.

key.description: Specify the content of Private Key to authenticate.

password.description: Specify the password for authenticating the worker.

retry_timeout.description: Specify the timeout to retry dialing. Defaults to `10m`.

username.description: Specify the username for authenticating the worker. Defaults to `root`.

with_agent.description: Specify to use ssh-agent to manage the login credential. Defaults to `false`.

block.description: Specify to use SSH to login the worker.
